scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.startNoClean: npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.devNoClean: npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.dev:development: npm run clean && npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts --development
scripts.dev:developmentNoClean: npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts --development
scripts.devStart: npm run clean && npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts --development
scripts.devStartNoClean: npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts --development
